同行者(やんばるエリア): パートナー(恋人・夫婦など)
情報収集(やんばるエリア)_ALL: Google Mapなどの地図アプリやサイトでの検索,Chat GPT等の生成AI
やんばるエリア内での交通手段の満足度の理由: Some mountain roads were narrow and bumpy. We wanted to explore more of the mountains but we were worried about damaging the rental car.
体験・サービス満足度の理由(やんばるエリア): It was really enjoyable. The nature is amazing and beautiful and people I’ve met are very friendly. We managed to see the things we want to see as well including Cape Hedo.
推奨項目(やんばるエリア): Cape Hedo, Churaumi Aquarium and Ocean Expo Park. A lot of things to see at the Expo Park area and the beautiful nature on the way to Cape Hedo shouldn’t be missed.
改善点の内容(やんばるエリア): The mountainous roads are a bit narrow for family rental cars unfortunately. We went to Nakayama Coffee farm and it was a little scary. The ride up the Cherry Blossoms Mt Yae was a little scary too.
訪問地のエリア名: 辺戸岬観光案内所エリア
